title: Lickety-split licorice
creator_credit: Joe Hayward, Moreland-Latchford Productions, Sterling Educational Films and Jan Steen
brief_description: A boy and girl making liquorice, stretch it outside in a tangled web which leads to utter chaos as people become entangled in it. When someone snips the gigantic piece of liquorice, the scenes flash rapidly backwards to reality. No spoken commentary - English intertitles.
creator_credit_for_label: Joe Hayward, Moreland-Latchford Productions, Sterling Educational Films and Jan Steen
